form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Part 7. Consideration for Providing Affidavit of Support ( (Continued)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/14/2023 Part 7. Consideration for Providing Affidavit of Support (Continued) I agree to submit to the personal jurisdiction of any court of the United States or of any State, territory, or possession the United States if the court has subject matter jurisdiction of a civil action to enforce this affidavit of support. I ag that no action to enforce this affidavit of support shall be barred by any statute of limitations that might otherwise ap: so long as the plaintiff initiates the civil action no later than ten (10) years after the date on which a sponsored immig: last received any means-tested public benefits. Collection of Judgment. I acknowledge that a plaintiff may seek specific performance of my support obligation. Furthermore, any money judgm against me based on this affidavit of support may be collected through the use of a judgment lien under 28 U.S.C. $320 writ of execution under 28 U.S.C. $3203, a judicial installment payment order under 28 U.S.C. ยง3204, or garnishm under 28 U.S.C. $3205, or through the use of any corresponding remedy under State law. I may also be held liable costs of collection, including attorney fees. Concluding Provisions. I, TARA SINGH DHESI certify under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United State that: (a) I know the contents of this affidavit of support signed by me; (b) That all the statements in this affidavit of support are true and correct; (c) That I make this affidavit of support for the consideration stated in Part 7, freely, and without any me reservation or purpose of evasion. (d) That Income Tax Returns submitted in support of this affidavit are true copies of the returns filed with Internal Revenue Service; and (e) Any other evidence submitted is true and correct. MAY 5th 1997 Tara singh Dhesi (Date) (Sponsor's Signature) Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me this 5 TH day of MAY 1997 (Month) (Year) at YUBA CiTy . My commission expires on JUNE 18, 1997 Kulwat & Joll NOTARY PUBLIC (Signature of Officer( Administering Oath) (Title) Kulwant S. Johl Comm. #997929 PUBLIC CALIFORNIA SUTTER COUNTY CALIFORNIA Comm. Expires June 18, 1997 Part 8. If someone other than the sponsor prepared this affidavit of support, that perso: must complete the following: I certify under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States that I prepared this affidavit of support at the sponsor's request, and that this affidavit of support is based on all information of which I have knowledge.
